description: WE ARE AN UNDERGROUND MOVEMENT. SPAWNED BY A REBELLION AGAINST BORING OLD IDEAS. WE DIDN'T COME TO SIT STILL AND BE QUIET. WE CAME TO START A RIOT.

contracts.name: Data Contract
contracts.description: This contract holds data that is referenced by the other contracts.

contracts.name: Marketplace Contract
contracts.description: This contract handles selling, offering, auctions, and timelocks.

contracts.name: Stake Contract
contracts.description: This contract handles the staking of all funds.

contracts.name: Minting Contract
contracts.description: This contract handles minting of CIP68 NFTs.

contracts.name: CIP68 Data Storage Contract
contracts.description: This contract handles the storage of the CIP68 NFT data.
